quote: I do not live when I loose belief in the existence of God. I should long ago have killed myself had I not had a dim hope of finding Him. I live really live only when I feel him and seek Him
quote_letters: I DO NOT LIVE WHEN I LOOSE BELIEF IN THE EXISTENCE OF GOD I SHOULD LONG AGO HAVE KILLED MYSELF HAD I NOT HAD A DIM HOPE OF FINDING HIM I LIVE REALLY LIVE ONLY WHEN I FEEL HIM AND SEEK HIM

chat:
Livelihood: Source of income or job.
Eileen: Female name of Irish origin.
Oldham: Town in Greater Manchester, England.
They've: Contraction of "they have".
Olympiad: An international multi-sport event, such as the Olympic Games.
Liking: Fondness or preference for someone or something.
Sheikh: A leader or ruler in certain Islamic countries.
Though: Despite the fact that.
Oliveira: Portuguese surname.
Yemeni: Relating to Yemen or its people.
Ashland: City in southern Oregon, United States.
Convened: Assembled or gathered together for a meeting.
Oneself: Referring to the person speaking or writing.
Nighttime: The period between evening and morning.
Follow: Go or come after or behind someone or something.
Exiled: Forced to live outside of one's native country.
Sheffield: City in South Yorkshire, England.
Showed: Past tense of "show".
Indigo: A deep purplish-blue color.
Offline: Not connected to the internet or a network.
Namibia: Country in southern Africa.
